channel.title: Robot 40
channel.itunes:author: robot 40
channel.itunes:subtitle: Robot 40 explores the finer things in life... 40s, .75 cigars and indie rock. There are random conversations and interviews from members of your favorite bands.
channel.itunes:summary: Robot 40 explores the finer things in life... 40s, .75 cigars and indie rock. There are random conversations and interviews from members of your favorite bands.

item.title: 111: Jim Henson's Robot 40
item.itunes:author: robot 40
item.itunes:subtitle: Ben and I talk about stuff. That's pretty much it... random stuff. One of this week's songs is a cover you should recognize. If you recognize it, email me and you might get a prize. Probably not though.

item.itunes:author: robot 40
item.itunes:subtitle: Bob and I drink some forties and do some drunk dialing. We also solicit some drunk dialing... It's a fun way to bring back Robot 40 after a long summer break!

item.itunes:author: robot 40

item.itunes:author: robot 40
